com.wisper.cli

Class Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wisper.cli.Argument

  • public class Argument
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents any parameter passed to the program besides flags and options.
    Author:
    Tobias Marstaller

    • Constructor Detail

      • Argument

        public Argument(java.lang.String accessName,
                int index)
        Constructs a new argument placed at index index that can be accessed by accessName on code level.
        Parameters:
        accessName - The name this argument should be accessed with.
        index - index The index this argument is placed at.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If index is less than 0.

      • Argument

        public Argument(java.lang.String accessName,
                int index,
                java.lang.Object defaultValue)
        Constructs a new argument placed at index index that can be accessed by accessName on code level.
        Parameters:
        accessName - The name this argument should be accessed with.
        index - index The index this argument is placed at.
        defaultValue - The default value for this argument.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If index is less than 0.

      • Argument

        public Argument(java.lang.String accessName,
                int index,
                java.lang.Object defaultValue,
                ValueFilter filter)
        Constructs a new argument placed at index index that can be accessed by accessName on code level.
        Parameters:
        accessName - The name this argument should be accessed with.
        index - index The index this argument is placed at.
        defaultValue - The default value for this argument.
        filter - A filter to validate input for this argument.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If index is less than 0.
